name: WordPressUniversal
tagline: PCL library that aims at simplyfing WordPress based news reader apps across C# platforms.
body:
WordPressUniversal is a PCL library that aims at simplyfing WordPress based news reader apps. Compatible with WP8&81SL, WP8.1 Runtime, Win81 and Xamarin.iOS as well as Xamarin.Android. Currently, guest commenting is not supported by Jetpack's JSON API. 

I already reached out to them and will add this feature as soon as it is available.

To get started, you declare a new WordPressClient:

`
WordPressClient client = new WordPressClient();
`

This enables you to use the  basic methods to fetch the important data from your WordPress site into your app:


* `client.GetPostList(string site, PostType type, PostStatus status, int? number = null, int? offset = null)   `
* `client.GetCategoriesList(string site, int? number = null, int? offset = null)   `
* `client.GetCommentsList(string site, CommentsListType listType, CommentType type, CommentStatus status, string post_id= null, int? number = null, int? offset = null)  ` 

I will update this page soon with more details on how to use this library.
